title: 25 Top Neumorphism UI Design Examples
body: It's the UI trend that's taking over 2020. Neumorphic objects mimic their real-world counterparts, both in how they appear and in how the user interacts with them. As a visual style, we have lots of inner and outer shadows to give the illusion of shape. Also raised shapes made from the exact same "material" as the background. Neumorphism as a design promotes user interfaces that look soft and easy on the eye. So without further ado, here are 25 Top Neumorphism UI Design Examples for your inspiration! [Simple Music Player by Filip Legierski](https://dribbble.com/shots/9338617-Simple-Music-Player) # [Simple Music Player ‚òÄÔ∏è Light mode ‚òÄÔ∏è by Filip Legierski](https://dribbble.com/shots/9517002--Light-Mode-Simple-Music-Player) # [Fitness Device App by Sergi Mi](https://dribbble.com/shots/9800109-Fitness-Device-App) # [Tesla Smart App by Gavrisov Dmitri](https://dribbble.com/shots/10196092-Tesla-Smart-App) # [Sleep Cycle App by Devanta Ebison](https://dribbble.com/shots/9236283-Sleep-Cycle-App-Neumorphism-Redesign) # [Nike Shoes E-Commerce by Zaini Achmad](https://dribbble.com/shots/9390903-Nike-Shoes-E-Commerce-Neumorphism) # [Audiophilia / Neumorphism by David Tsaturyan](https://dribbble.com/shots/9656631-Audiophilia-Neumorphism) # [Hello Dribbble <3 by Marina Tericheva](https://dribbble.com/shots/9197165-Hello-Dribbble-3) # [Neumorphic UI by Varsha Singh](https://dribbble.com/shots/10003669-Neumorphic-UI) # [Braun Neu Calculator üéö by Ariel Jƒôdrzejczak](https://dribbble.com/shots/9807422-Braun-Neu-Calculator) # [Spotify Redesigned by Vardnan](https://dribbble.com/shots/9993994-Spotify-Redesigned-Neumorphism) # [First Shot -
